BACKUP_RULE_INVALID.error_message: The backup_rule block has an invalid value.

SIZE_INVALID.error_message: The attribute size has an invalid value.

TIER_INVALID.error_message: The attribute tier has an invalid value.

TITLE_INVALID.error_message: The attribute title has an invalid value.

STORAGE_STATE_ILLEGAL.error_message: The storage is in a state in which it cannot be used. See Storage states.

ZONE_INVALID.error_message: The attribute zone has an invalid value.

STORAGE_INVALID.error_message: The attribute storage has an invalid value.

STORAGE_DEVICE_LIMIT_REACHED.error_message: The request contained more than four storage_device blocks.

STORAGE_DEVICES_MISSING.error_message: The storage_devices block is missing from the request.

STORAGE_TYPE_ILLEGAL.error_message: The type of the storage to be attached is illegal. Only storages of type normal can be resized. See Storage types.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.error_message: We really have no clue. Debug log will reveal more.
